mapper.select: select role_id from sys_dept_type_role tr where tr.dept_type_id = #{id}
select t.id, t.parent_id, t.name as title, t.code as `key`, t.code as data from sys_dept_type t where t.status = #{status} order by t.order_no
select count(1) from sys_dept_type sdt where sdt.parent_id = (select id from sys_dept_type sdt2 where sdt2.code = #{code})
